ygData.subject: Re: Group or Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Indeed, I just started an experimental Bard on the PvP server to see what that was like. Without a doubt, twas not my bag.  Not that I had a bad experience
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:09 PM 7/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
>This is not a complaint mind you. Soloing has made me into a hardy adventure
>able to cope with circumstance well beyond my meager skills. Has anyone else
>had experiences similar to these?

Indeed, I just started an experimental Bard on the PvP server to see what
that was like. Without a doubt, twas not my bag. Not that I had a bad
experience - no one killed me - but I was very nervous all the time,
watching over my shoulder for the backstabbing PKers that I just KNEW were
lurking around the corner. I spent more time as a zone warrior, because
that way, at least I'd have a shot at getting away. Not enjoyable. Then
to discover that my 2nd level song is utterly useless because it's hitting
everyone around me, and not just the monsters *aaagh*
I decided to take a break from PvP.
Maybe when the racewar server comes online, I'll try it.

Talies the Wanderer
Bristlebane
